players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Charlie last night, he was alive. Could someone have killed him?"
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice, did you see me doing it?"
Diana: "I am the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. Alice, you saw him kill Charlie last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
